subject: It's time to start selling. Trust us.
description_text:
Sell smart. Earn More. 
Start on TikTok Shop. 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
Hi there, 
 
Your 
 
products are already in high demand 
— now it's time to maximize their potential. 
 

Start selling on TikTok Shop and meet shoppers where they scroll.
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
Looking to register? Here's how ⬇️ 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
Step 1 
Set up with your existing TikTok account or sign up on the 
TikTok Shop Seller Center. 
 
 

Step 2 
Submit verification details like your ID and full business details.
 
 
 
 
 
Step 3 
 
 
 Showcase
 your products, connect your payment account, and start selling NOW!
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
Register here 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
What does TikTok Shop have to offer? ? 
 
 

 
 
 
 


Collaborate with creators 
 

 
 
 
 
 
Collaborate with over 100k creators
 and let them promote your products through LIVEs or Shoppable Videos.

 

 
 
 
 


Reach a new audience 
 

 
 
 
 

This holiday season, shoppers are scrolling on TikTok. Meet your buyers here and 


accelerate your shop’s growth. 
 

 
 
 
 


Enjoy low fees and high rewards 
 

 
 
 
 
With £0 sign up
 
fees and up to £800 customer vouchers 
, it's easy to sell on TikTok Shop. (T&Cs apply) 
 
 

 
 
 
 
Sign up to TikTok Shop today 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
Join the brands thriving on TikTok Shop 
 

 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
? Doug's Vintage achieved 40K+ video views and $50K+ revenue in just 2 months.
 
 
They used TikTok LIVEs to build excitement and share expert knowledge to connect with collectors and grow a loyal community.
 
 
? One LIVE alone drove $15K in sales, proving the power of consistent streaming.

 

 
 
 
 
Sign up in time for the holiday season 
 
 

 
 
 
 
All the best, Olivia 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
TikTok Shop 

6th Floor One London Wall 

London, EC2Y 5EB 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 

 
This message was sent by TikTok Information Technologies Limited. To manage your email preferences or unsubscribe, please click 
here.
